transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan ji boliye.
Customer: Subhan sir aapne fir se ye not satisfied kar diya tha.
Executive: Kahan pe?
Customer: Whatsapp pe aapke paas feedback ka jaata hai na sir maine last time bhi aapko bataya tha ye wo PC pe gaya hoga isliye.
Customer: Kya sir?
Executive: PC pe gaya hoga wahan pe whatsapp chalu hai mere mobile mein nahi hai.
Customer: PC kiske paas hota hai?
Executive: PC office pe hai.
Customer: Office mein kiske paas hota hai? Kaun person carry karta hai?
Executive: Matlab ye wo koi baitha nahi hai main hi baithta hu lekin koi use karta hai jaise ki kisi ko kaam pada to koi bhi use karega aisa.
Customer: To matlab IndiaMART ki services ka message dekh ke koi bhi aise not satisfied kar sakta hai aapke alawa?
Executive: Hmm?
Customer: Matlab IndiaMART ki services ke regarding agar koi message jaata hai whatsapp pe aur koi office mein hai aap nahi hai.
Executive: Nahi kisi ne click kar diya hoga nahi kisi ne click kar diya hoga baki to koi.
Customer: Sir isliye dekho maine aapko last time bhi guide kiya tha ye IndiaMART ke bare mein bilkul nahi hota ye hamare aur aapke jo conversation ho rahi hai main jo aapki profile pe mehnat kar raha hu jo main koshish kar raha hu uske bare mein hota hai sir.
Executive: Hmm sahi hai.
Customer: Aap IndiaMART ki services se fir se bhej dijiye main satisfied kar dunga.
Customer: Ab to sir iske liye main abhi ye aise to nahi jayega ek baar main discussion complete kar leta hu aapke dobara se tab aapke paas ye message jayega aap usko fir react kar dena.
Executive: Thik hai.
Customer: Main isme aapke ek second main dekh leta hu aaj aapne fir lead consume kari thi uske baad jab hamari baat hui hai ye maine batayi thi.
Executive: Haan ji kari thi sorry ji sorry ji.
Customer: Unse sirf lead consume kari aapne proper baat nahi kari unse.
Executive: Kya?
Customer: Sirf lead consume karke chhod di thi ya baat bhi kar li thi un customer se jinse lead consume kari.
Executive: Sorry ji wo phone nahi utha rahe the.
Customer: Kya phone nahi utha rahe the to main catalog inka whatsapp pe message ha catalog bhi bheja whatsapp pe message kar diya.
Executive: Thik hai tabhi koi reply nahi aaya unka.
Customer: Nahi aaya abhi tak reply.
Customer: Aur wo within kitne time ke andar kisi ko lead aapne consume kari thi aaj jaise?
Executive: Kya?
Customer: Jo lead thi wo aapne time dekha tha usse lead kitne andar ke time matlab kitne andar andar ke time ki lead thi wo?
Executive: Wo lead thi 11 ghante pehle ki thi.
Customer: 11 ghante pehle ki thi thodi purani thi.
Customer: Abhi 33 minute pehle ek lead aayi hai thik hai aur ye 1000 ton ki lead hai ek baar aap application on karke dekho call pe hi.
Executive: Dekh leta hu.
Customer: Ji ji aap is lead ko consume kijiye kyuki fresh lead hai aur aapke order quantity ko match bhi karti hai jaise aapne bataya tha.
Executive: Thoda sa na hame active rehna padega ek 2500 kg ki to khair chhoti ho jayegi.
Customer: Sath mein mujhe ab aap mujhe ab jab proper aapse discussion karna padega jo bhi matlab purani leads aapne consume kari hai last teen weeks ka aur jin queries aapke paas aayi hai thik hai jaise agar main baat karta hu yahan pe last week ka main aapse puchh leta hu.
Customer: Call karenge aap.
Customer: Jo Chennai ki lead thi yaani aaj aapne consume kari isne jawab aapko diya nahi hai abhi aapne 28th october ko LR potato potato ki ki thi 50 kg ki thi wo lead thik hai sir.
Executive: Sahi hai.
Customer: Unse baat hui thi aapki 28 tarikh ko jisse aapne baat kari.
Executive: 28 tarikh ko haan ji yes hui thi 28 tarikh.
Customer: Thik hai to usse kya matlab usko yun puchh raha tha banda to kaise ke LR ka kya hai kya nahi hai.
Customer: Achha achha sirf puchh raha tha matlab sanvardhan ka koi wo nahi tha wahan pe okay.
Executive: Haan ji.
Customer: Koi nahi aap follow up mein rakhna fir bhi customer ko agar puchh raha tha to shayad aane wale time mein kabhi aapke ye kisi cheez ke liye convert ho jaye ek Palanpur ki thi 17 october ko ye to kafi purani hai yaad hai aapko iska kuch.
Executive: Sahi hai.
Customer: Main aapko aap mere ko ghante bhar mein call back kar sakte hai.
Executive: Sir sir aap kar lijiyega koi issue nahi hai aap mujhe bas do minute ka samay de dijiye.
Customer: Aur jaise ki aapka jo bhi hai wo main aise mein abhi to office pe nahi hu lekin aap bhejenge to main office pe whatsapp pe chalu hai main satisfied kar dunga.
Customer: Bilkul aap usse kar dijiyega lekin mujhe aap sirf ek minute ka samay aur dijiye mujhe sirf inquiries ka aur jo aapke products ki wo chal rahi hai progressing uska puchhna hai jyada lambi call nahi jayegi apni isme ek inquiry aapke paas aayi thi I am interested in A grade fresh lady ye 4 november yaani aaj ki date mein customer ne aapko directly message kiya tha isko aapne reply kiya message dekha aapne ye?
Executive: Maine message sab dekhta hu lekin maine call bhi kiya hoga lekin kuch na kuch problem ye hogi.
Customer: Aaj thik hai jis vajah se abhi koi nahi mujhe ab aap ek aur bata dijiye isme red potato jo hai apni B rank ja red potato ki lead kafi time se consume consume nahi kari hai aapne.
Executive: Mere ko hai na mere ko abhi jaise ki mere ko bhi requirement jaise sabki requirement aayegi na mere ko bhi mere ko bhi fayda hai isme mere ko ghumna kam padega aur sir hame bhi fayda hai agar aapke paas milega to hame bhi fayda hai sir.
Executive: Haan haan main bhi is company mein as a salesman hu mere ko bhi fayda hoga mere ko ghumna kam padega ab jaise ki ab mere ko abhi isse kuch fayda nahi hoga na IndiaMART se to ab mere ko january se ab ghumne ka chalu karna padega pure India mein jaise ki 15 15 din bahar rehna pada hai.
Executive: Door door chalte chalte hi sab udyog mein jaane ka usse baat karne ki fir dusre dusre din dusri jagah dusre din teesri aise jaana padta hai.
Executive: Humko isse fayda pad jayega to bahut achha nahi isse hamare ko to kya hai isse contact karne ke baad bhi humko to wahan ja ke dekhna hi padega ki iska kaisa hai dukan hai ya kuch nahi hai banda kaisa hai.
Customer: Bilkul sir bilkul aapko fayda hoga sir aap isme rahe main yahan se puri mehnat karunga jitna ho sakta hai baki dekho ab aapke paas ek message jayega dobara se satisfied aur not satisfied ka thik hai sir.
Executive: Wo whatsapp pe main yahi bol raha hu ki main abhi bahar hu main jaise ki idhar maine lock out kar diya hai phone mein to PC mein chalu hai mera whatsapp.
Executive: To usse abhi maine phone badla tha na.
Executive: To mere idhar login nahi hai to main PC mein ja ke main satisfied kar dunga.
Customer: Thik hai thik hai jaise aap pahuchenge na office mein to aap ek baar ise satisfied kar dijiyega.
Executive: Haan ji kar dunga.
Customer: Thik hai ticket tha to thik hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer marked as not satisfied again.

- Lead consumed, but no proper conversation.

- Red potato lead not consumed for long time.



Resolution:

- Executive explained the reason for not satisfied.

- Executive will check the new lead of 1000 tons.

- Executive will satisfy after reaching office.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- not satisfied, lead consumption, follow up, whatsapp
